relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented x 3, in mild distress
relevant_findings.HEENT: PERRLA, no scleral icterus, mucus membranes moist, no erythema in oropharynx
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: PMI non-displaced, regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 S2, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, or rhonchi
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, mildly-distended, tender to palpation in the epigastrium, most significant in RUQ, without rebound or guarding, bowel sounds not audible, no palpable masses, no hepatosplenomegaly, Murphy's sign negative
